attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: rensate corperal and capital punishment.for the past thirty years the dogooders have had thier way and failed.people are scared to walk the streets or challeng youths who are damaging thier property. how many more inocent people have to die before anything is done. knife and gun crime has trebbled every day someone is shot or stabed. and there is absolutly no deterant, put it to the vote lets have a referendum let the people decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
